```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
data <- read_csv("../input/UCD_garden_size_measurements_20221128_corrected.csv")
```
```{r}
data <- read_csv("../input/UCD_garden_size_measurements_20221128_corrected2.csv")

```

```{r}
summary(data)
```

```{r}
data <- data %>% filter(`germinated?` == 1)
summary(data)
```
```{r}
data %>% 
  group_by(parent.pop) %>%
  summarize(Height=mean(`Height (cm)`, na.rm=TRUE), Longest_leaf=mean(`Longest leaf (cm)`, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(Height)
```

```{r}
sem <- function(x, na.rm=FALSE) {
  sd(x, na.rm = na.rm) / sqrt(length(na.omit(x)))
}
```

```{r}
data %>% 
  group_by(parent.pop) %>%
  summarize(Height=mean(`Height (cm)`, na.rm=TRUE), 
            sd_height=sem(`Height (cm)`, na.rm=TRUE),
            Longest_leaf=mean(`Longest leaf (cm)`, na.rm = TRUE),
            sem_leaf=sem(`Longest leaf (cm)`, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(Height)
```
